title: Conversation with Rev. David Snapper on Forgiveness
description:
Rev. David Snapper is a retired prison chaplain and church planter who does a seminar on forgiveness. There is also a boxed version of his seminar put out by Faith Alive resources called Unhurt https://www.faithaliveresources.org/Products/150681/unhurt-kit.aspx 

The participant guide can be found on Amazon https://www.amazon.com/Unhurt-Participant-Workbook-Healing-Forgiveness/dp/1592557627 

The boxed DVD version at Amazon https://www.amazon.com/Unhurt-Healing-Power-Forgiveness-DVD/dp/1592557635/
